validation.passIfHasNumber: if(function(password){let str = String(password); for( let i = 0; i < str.length; i++){if(!isNaN(str.charAt(i))){return true;}}return false} === false){return callback(400, {'Error' : 'password must contain a number.'});};

addForm.heading: Use a password with completly random characters
